item.title: Walking up Apex
item.description: Notes to Self Apex Triggers a before trigger is riding the wave and can make changes on the record – so its natural that it does not support a DML statement context variables indicate the triggering values and the behaviour of the trigger addError - to cause a fatal error and prevent further execution – this is interesting!
